incidents.name: Buy order batch failed
incidents.summary: Buy order batch with id c08b3d5b1aac4ca59e1462ee5d60a965 failed to be submitted due to not merged buy orders.

incidents.name: Plum is not available to customers
incidents.summary:
Looks like the issue affects any withplum.com domain. It had to do with domain verification that didn't happen within the deadline.
The problem has been resolved but we are waiting for the DNS to be updated.

incidents.name: Unusually high API error rate & waiting PgBouncer connections
incidents.summary:
Issues with market db connections (<#C02LP12SM09|squad-stocks>)

PG Bouncer connection should have been started due to IEX provider 5xx responses. This made marketdb unoperationational for anyone.

Users affected the onces that have feature flag for stocks and either active investments or trying to do first order.

Issue resolved by stopping the job that updates the market prices and killing idle queries.

I can see overall the latency of the market API to be reduced in the last here 6hours: https://grafana.srv.withplum.com/d/Ib2iFKOGz/plum-api?orgId=1&var-datasource=prometheus-production-0&var-app=api-market&var-path=All&from=now-6h&to=now

I can still see queries growing in minutes but seems it is managed but should follow up.

I can see stabilisation in poll connections for market here https://grafana.srv.withplum.com/d/ZEGmB3lik/postgresql-pgbouncer?orgId=1&var-datasource=prometheus-production-0&var-host=All&var-port=All&var-db=All&var-hostname=marketdb-pgbouncer-exporter-5b8bf8cbcc-jf7pb&from=now-3h&to=now&refresh=30s

incidents.name: Polish Referrals
incidents.summary: Over 500 polish users were successfully referred even though Plum doesn't operate in Poland. The app is available in the Polish Apple Store and Google Play and user were able to change their country to any of the available countries and link their Revolut, Wise or N26

incidents.name: Webhooks not received by Quai
incidents.summary: Quai failed to send webhooks for both sell and buy batches for the three days in the row. As a result for buy orders we did not send payments on time and for sell orders we did not get confirmation that sell batch from March 2nd failed.

incidents.name: Late failure fraud
incidents.summary: User trying to deposit EUR 3 million to Plum via direct debit and commit late failure fraud. In all likelihood the loss to Plum will not be anything, but there are steps we need to take to reject the payment and process the rest of the payment batch properly

incidents.name: Subscription Tab blank
incidents.summary:
On the latest iOS version, the subscription tab is blank for the user that are subscribed to the highest plan.

That means Ultra users in UK and Pro users in EU see an empty page. 

A PR on iOS fixed that and a hotfix was released.

incidents.name: Buy batch submission Failed (2022/02/21)
incidents.summary:
The buy batch submission  for 2022/02/21 was rejected during the scheduled process. We retried manually later and got rejected again.
The incident is being opened since the submission of these orders should now be considered as very urgent.

incidents.name: Pensions feature flag available to EU customers
incidents.summary:
During some testing that we did for a new aggregation provider, we found out that EU users have the pensions (sipp) feature flag available. Especially on Android the Investments homescreen tile is visible on EU users because of the existence of this flag.

We found out that the "sipp" feature flag is globally enabled (at 2021-06-01T10:42:53.925+00:00) but the countries field is not set. As a result sipp is enabled for everyone.

incidents.name: quai out of service
incidents.summary:
We are facing some problems with Quai, their service is down today, and we are failing to communicate all requests to their application.
We expect to fail some process:
buy order batch submit
sell order batch submit
transfer in orders from reconciliation
fund prices
update user data
payin process (we will not be able to fetch the instructions)

incidents.name: Application Cron Jobs are not running
incidents.summary:
Application Cron Jobs are not running. 
This appears to have been caused due to `upgrade to python 3.9` and the `cron` scheduler has been affected.

Issue resolved.

No clear product was affected but had to choose one at this stage.
